id: Trump says GOP working on tax plan for middle class
paragraph: By Sophie TatumUpdated 6:13 PM ET, Sat October 20, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.Washington (CNN)Republicans are looking into implementing an additional tax break for middle-income Americans ahead of the midterm elections, President Donald Trump said on Saturday. CNN's Rachel Ventresca, Euan McKirdy, Sarah Sirgany and Clarissa Ward contributed to this report.
